ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Combat Effects
ygData.msgSnippet: Some weapons require a certain level before the effect will proc (process).  It could be that you just havent reached a high enough level for this to happen.
ygData.messageBody:
Some weapons require a certain level before the effect will "proc" (process).  It could be that you just havent reached a high enough level for this to happen.  Until then you will only get your 10+.  When it does proc it will be accompanied by a text message sayng "Such and such was hit by a cold wind for so many points of damage." or something like that.   Some weapons have a number in parentheses.  That number in parentheses is the level you need for the weapon to work at maximum.
 
 
Wulfric
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Techpriest
To: EverQuest (E-mail)
Sent: Sunday, November 30, 2003 1:51 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Combat Effects

I have a sword that has Effect: Spirit Strike (Combat) in the description.
Below the details it says something about a cold wind and doing 81-91 points
of damage or soemthing like that.  My 11 Wood Elf Ranger tried it in combat
and it just kept doing 10+/- damage. Can only certain people take advantage
of the effect, is it random or do I need to activate it?

Thanks!

You have gotten better at Reading! (35)
